::Zardus::

"I must attend to other buisness now," Zardus says to the two new members, 
"You two can get familiar with the base. I don't suggest firing your weapons 
anywhere but the training areas."

He takes out a device and tosses it to Stranato. "That's a holo-map of the 
base, it'll help you get settled in."

Zardus turns to Wheeljack, walking down the hallway and motioning for the 
other to follow.

"Interesting weapon," he says to the inventor, "But bot's don't ussually pop. 
What does it use to inflate the target?"
